item.title: Bhindi Aloo Dry
item.description: Bhindi is one of the most loved vegetables in India. There is a saying that people who love Bhindi are very intelligent. I figure thatâ€™s why I was never the top student of my class. It was really a hot day and Sumi was in her bad mood. So we went vegetable shopping and there was this set of Okra almost smiling at her (I think so) and Sumi got impressed by their smile (I think this too) because that instant she bought 500 grams of it.
